trans-unit.source: The ServiceNameElement class represents a configuration element for a service name used in a <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection"></xref>.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> class.

When this constructor is used to initialize a new instance of the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> class, the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property is set to `null`.

The <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement.Name%2A> property should be set to an appropriate value for the application before calling the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection.Add%2A> method to add the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement> instance to the <xref:System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElementCollection> class.
Gets or sets the Service Provider Name (SPN) for this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance.
A <xref:System.String> that contains the representation of SPN for this <xref href="System.Security.Authentication.ExtendedProtection.Configuration.ServiceNameElement"></xref> instance.
